Name: Chevreuse
Title: Executor of Justice: Chevreuse
Source: Reward for inviting Chevreuse to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

13132.Name: Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire
13132.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the Skill finalizes:</color> If your Hand has <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113131]</color>: $[K56] 1 of them and heal the character on your team that has taken the most damage for 1 HP.

C113131.Name: Overcharged Ball
C113131.Desc: $[K1]: Deal 1 $[K103] to the opponent's active character.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this card is $[K56]ed:</color> Deal 1 $[K103] to the opponent's active character.

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

K103.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>
K103.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melt</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

K56.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color>
K56.Desc: Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.

K56.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color>
K56.Desc: Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.

13133.Name: Ring of Bursting Grenades
13133.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113132]</color> on the opponent's side of the field.

C113132.Name: Secondary Explosive Shells
C113132.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After a character switch takes place on this side of the field:</color> Deal 1 $[K103] to the character switched to.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

13134.Name: Vertical Force Coordination
13134.Desc: (Passive) <color=#FFFFFFFF>After an opponent's character takes Overloaded reaction DMG:</color> Create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113131]</color> card in your Hand (Once per Round)
